channel.title: Linkin Park fan's read me
channel.description:
The new linkin park album Minutes to Midnight is due to be released on the 14th of May, However, someone has leaked the album and the download has been on torrentspy.com... I now have this album and am willing to share it... I'm not sure If I'm allowed to post a link to it here... You can find more about the album on wikipedia. If you want the album PLEASE email me and I will give you a direct link to the file, this is just to track how many downloads it gets.
[email]sycrat@bipgond.net.au[/email]

item.title: Linkin Park fan's read me
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

This is an Internet Forum.

An Internet forum is a facility on the World Wide Web for holding discussions and posting user generated content, or the web application software used to provide this facility. Internet forums are also commonly referred to as web forums, message boards, discussion boards, (electronic) discussion groups, discussion forums, bulletin boards, fora[1] (the Latin plural) or simply forums.

Therefore, I should be entitled to post my opinion. If someone posted a topic on your site that said “Java coders only”, you would obviously read it. If they post it here, you would read it. I saw, and I felt I needed to say, who gives a fuck about linkin park, becuase they have relatively no talent.

l2post, fag.

Read full topic
